item.title: Female English speaking model for a UGC testimonial video for social media marketing agency - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for a short testimonial video on my marketing brand which would be under 1 minute (about 30-50 seconds). I will provide the script. If you can't make the script sound natural, I will instead put brief bullet points of what to say in the testimonial video

It has to sound authentic, not fake sounding at all and should come across as natural, like making a testimonial in your bedroom

Needs to be filmed for instagram story format (1080 x 1920, 9:16)

Budget: $20

Category: Video Production

item.title: After Effects expert - Animation for Websites and Video Edits - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced Adobe After Effects contractor to create compelling animations for our website and also edit advertising videos. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in motion graphics, video editing, and a keen eye for detail.

Key Responsibilities:

Develop and create high-quality animations using Adobe After Effects for various sections of our website.
Edit advertising videos to enhance visual appeal and ensure they meet our brand standards.
Collaborate with the marketing and design teams to understand project requirements and deliver engaging content.
Implement feedback and make necessary revisions to animations and videos.
Ensure all animations and videos are optimized for web performance and compatibility across different devices and browsers.
Stay updated with the latest trends and techniques in animation and video editing.

Qualifications:

Proven experience as a motion graphics designer and video editor using Adobe After Effects.
Strong portfolio showcasing previous work in animations and video editing.
Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite, particularly After Effects, Premiere Pro, and Photoshop.
Solid understanding of animation principles, storytelling, and visual composition.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality work.
Knowledge of HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript is a plus but not required.

Hourly Range: $18.00-$32.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 06:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, Testimonial Video, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Animation, Motion Graphics, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Commercial, Testimonial Video, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Animation, Motion Graphics, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Podcast Management and Social Media Content Creation - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented individual to manage our podcast audio and video editing, as well as create engaging social media posts. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of podcast production, video editing software, and social media platforms. Responsibilities include editing podcast episodes, enhancing audio quality, adding intros/outros, and creating visually appealing videos. Additionally, you will be responsible for creating social media content to promote our podcast, including graphics, captions, and hashtags. Strong attention to detail, creativity, and the ability to work independently are essential. Join our team and help us grow our podcast audience through high-quality content and engaging social media presence.

Skills needed:
- Podcast audio editing
- Video editing
- Social media content creation
- Graphic design
- Copywriting
- Social media management

Hourly Range: $12.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 05:57 UTC
Category: Content Strategy
Skills:Social Media Management, Social Media Content Creation, Content Strategy, Social Media Marketing, Content Writing
Skills: Social Media Management, Social Media Content Creation, Content Strategy, Social Media Marketing, Content Writing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Faceless Cash Cow Videos ( Total Cost Per Video? ) - Upwork
item.description:
To Apply: Quote me how much you will charge me PER VIDEO, for everything.  

You can leverage as many AI tools as you need to like: Pictory, Eleven Labs, Gamma AI, whatever you need to use.

Looking for someone that can make videos for my youtube channel here:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOB-5jnfDH24_pHVawul57g

looking for someone that will give me a total cost PER video.

That means everything, scriptwriting, thumbnail etc...
and a humanized voice over using eleven labs or a similar tool that passes the youtube monetization standards.

Please tell me how much you will charge me for each 10 minute video. TOTAL.  Total price.

I will not consider anything else except for a clear total price.

I'm really looking for someone that's hungry to get experience and knows they can do that, and will be happy with getting paid PER VIDEO and doing it all.

I'm not trying to waste anyone's time, so please do not reply if you do not give me a total per video based on the youtube channel I am showing you.

Thank you very much.

Hourly Range: $3.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 05:29 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Subtitles, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Editing, Subtitles, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Country: United States
click to apply
